questions: Who remarked “When France sneezes the rest of Europe catches cold” ?
Name the event that mobilised nationalist feelings among the educated elite across Europe in 1830– 1848.
Name the Treaty of 1832 that recognised Greece as an independent nation.  Which treaty recognised Greece as an independent nation ?
What was the strong demand of the emerging middle classes in Europe during nineteenth century?
answers: The strong demand of the emerging middle classes in Eurpoe was freedom of markets and the abolition of state imposed restructure on the movement of goods and capital.
